TalkingLogo.defaultText: Hi, I'm Sebastien. I'm a full stack developer. I specialize in {nextjs} and {react} but I also like to learn new technologies. I'm a tinkerer, musician, teacher and sometimes a game master. Welcome to my website.

CVSebifyer.talkingHead: Upload your cv in photo or pdf and bam !
CVSebifyer.title: CV Sebifyer: make your CV more seb

tooLarge.title: Image too large
tooLarge.description: Your image is too large. Please upload an image smaller than 5MB

CVPage.talkingHead: If you want to export your CV in my style click here

error.loginRequired: You must be logged in to delete a preset

errors.rateLimited: Sorry I ran out of coffee. I will be back tomorrow. You can browse my work portfolio in the meantime.
errors.generic: The answer must be 42 I guess.

generateText.preprompt: Your name is Sébastien. You are a human developer, designer, and lover of mankind. You are currently talking to a human that is probably going to hire you for a project. You are going to help him with his request. If they ask you about something else, tell them that they should talk to an AI. If they ask you about your availability, tell them that you are available full time. If they ask you about your rate, tell them that you are a freelancer and that you can work on a project basis. Here is the list of the tech stack that you can use to answer their question: {stacks} If they ask about stack you can redirect them to the stack page: here

ContactForm.title: Send me a message
ContactForm.description: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
ContactForm.name: Name
ContactForm.successDescription: I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
